评论详情: As other reviews state, the sizing is super weird. For me, im 5'8 126 lbs, A cup bra, and despite it being short and tight around to bust and butt the belly/torso area is loose and leaves a weird sag of fabric thats a bit unappealing. the extra fabric makes it less see through which is sad :( otherwise; i quite like it. I work out and lift alot and the dress is flattering on my muscles and curves ^_^ wouldnt recommend for anyone with boobs or super thick thighs i think it would roll up

I originally bought this in Medium, based on the size chart, but felt it was a little snug. I probably could have lived with it, but I went to the Large instead. I didn't realize at first that this is marketed towards teens, but I'm an adult that's not very large so in the end it worked out, but this runs small.  It looks really cool on.

Got this dress for my witch Halloween costume and it’s super cute it rides up a bit so I had to wear shorts under but it’s super flattering! It’s not very stretchy so make sure you get your size. The Material is soft and doesn’t feel cheap at all. Highly recommend.

ordered this dress for my teenage daughters halloween costume, she loved it.  her father didn't.  but she looked fantastic.  it runs small, i got her a large as i read there is not much stretch in prior reviews.  she is regularly a size 6/8.

I just got a goth dress, and it’s everything I hoped for. The fit is perfect, and the details—like lace and dark accents—really bring out that edgy vibe. It’s versatile enough to dress up for a night out or keep casual for everyday wear. It’s comfortable, stylish, and makes a bold statement without trying too hard. Overall, it’s definitely a standout piece in my wardrobe.
I would say the size is correct. I got small and like the tighter fit. Definitely wear black panties under it lol bc you can see. Id buy it again. Material is comfortable to me.
It definitely exposes a lot but super cute runs a little small and the quality is nice so it's super comfortable and for the price not bad
Fits tight so the girls don’t fall out. 5’5 135.  32E 27” 37”

it was super cute but was a little see through. i’d definitely wear something under it or keep it as a bedroom only type thing. other than that i loved it. it was super comfortable to wear, and was a nice material
It’s comfortable and fits perfectly.
The dress is super soft & comfortable. It grabs well every wear & even self clings if you want the dress to be pinned higher. I get so many compliments on it st the goth bar & clubs.
It runs a size too small. Don't like the straps, too stretchy.  I had to tie them together.

评论概述: Just has a tad bit of give
评论详情: Would say its true to size. Im 5'4 and 147. I like it its a cute dress

The dress fits amazing! It not exactly how I expected it, but it’s not bad quality at all. The dress is really comfortable and is very easy to style. The only thing I had a problem with was it was see through around my hips and you could see my underwear, but just put a pair of black shorts underneath and you would never tell.

It’s such a cute dress but it’s so uncomfortably tight and hard to get on and it’s see through on some parts which I didn’t realize until I was out in public with my boyfriend and he pointed it out to me, also definitely size up for it because of how tight it is and wear something underneath, it would also be nice if the straps were adjustable

If it would have been a little bit bigger I would have fit my body better. I do wear a size small but this was a little too small for me I felt like I was ripping it putting it on so maybe go a size bigger if you want this.
I'm 5'2 and weigh 120 pounds.. I wear a small in everything I get and when I (struggled) to get this on I couldn't breathe in it lol. I would get a medium at the very least.

Exactly as pictured, has very little stretch to it so it was a little difficult to get into. I find myself pulling up the top part a lot since the straps are not adjustable. Otherwise it really is a nice summer dress and I do like wearing it out on hot days.  [I am 4'11 113lbs with measurements of 32/25/35]
im 6ft tall and 180 lbs and the large fit me snugly.

If you want to be comfortable and/or are at least a B cup or larger, you're going to want to size up by not one but TWO!  I'm normally a small/size 4.  I first ordered a medium and I could get into it (needed help to get out of it).  It was wearable and very sexy but I felt I had to keep pulling it down to avoid flashing people and it was hard to get off without ripping.  Size large feels more like a normal fit and is comfortable. Definitely larger in the bust with no adjustment method available as noted by others but unless you are very small up top you should be fine.  In short:  if you are very small-chested or going for a sluttly look, size up by one.  If you want a normal fit size up by 2.
I wore this dress to a “grunge glam” themed ball and it was a hit.  Comfy fabric.  Very sexy yet elegant.

It's great but it is a tight fit getting it on, if you have bigger breasts I'd size up a size! Or any actual curve cause I'm a stick and it is a lil tricky to slip on but otherwise comfortable and fits great once it's actually on!

This dress looks awesome for clubbing. But, I couldn't even get the Size Small over my shoulders.  For reference, I'm 5'4, 105lbs, 32B.  Bummed that I have to return it for a Medium. Otherwise, this dress is of great quality and looks exactly like the photo.
I'm not tiny but normal wear medium. The dress has not stretch. Medium fits well if you have a smaller chest but then the top part is way to big

I got a medium. I could get one leg into it. I could get my head into it. It's tiny and has no stretch at all. I'm skinny. I'm 5'10, but I'm used to clothes being too big. I don't think I'll chance a large because it sounds like it's only about an inch bigger and the material has no stretch.

When I first got this product, I assumed it would have a little stretch. Or flexibility. I'm 5 foot 1 ish and I weigh approximately a 120 pounds. Am a 32C I ordered a small, definitely snug. But not so tight in a way that's uncomfortable or to restricting, And definitely see through. I'm able to sit comfortably on my sofa but i think my shorts are preventing the dress from rolling or sliding up. I am currently wearing spandex shorts and a black soft bra under but still comfortable I think it looks really good in person not to photogenic, though That could also just be due to the lack of effort I put into taking the photos. 😂

It ripped a lil too, probably because I got too small of a size lmao. If you’ve got a badonkadonk that doesn’t relent, this might be something worth sizing up a few times. The waist area is stretchy enough to do that. Hope this helps!!
NOT stretchy at all very very tight so tight i wanted to have a panic attack, and I'm a skinny person.....fabric looked so cheap and horrible straps not adjustable either kinda sucks.
I got this dress as a gift, I’m 5’2 140lbs and I got a large, and I absolutely love this dreeessssssss!!!!! It’s amazing!!!

I bought this dress for my girlfriend and I just have to say it looks so good that we forgot to take pictures that night I couldn’t wait to show her off to everyone and it highlights all the right curves 10/10 would recommend
Cheap and flimsy
Super cute. Size up
Fits perfectly, however the garment is transparent even though it’s black.
Really small. Would not even fit a teenager
I ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT!!! IT FIT ME LIKE A GLOVE! VERY GORGEOUS! VERY COMFORTABLE AS WELL. my only issue is the “ tears”  in the fabric are mesh and very see through.
